html:
Experience Letter

Date :{{ frappe.utils.format_date(frappe.utils.today(),"dd-MM-yyyy")}}

This is to certify that {{ doc.employee_name }} was employed with our organization from {{ doc.get_formatted("date_of_joining") }} to {{ doc.get_formatted("relieving_date") }}.

During the tenure, their services were satisfactory. We wish them all the best in their future endeavors.



Authorized Signatory
name: Experience Certificate
